hanzi-su-wiki:
棄

Значения

Бросать, оставлять

Мнемоника

Искажено. Древний обычай — выбрасывать лишних или уродливых детей 子 (перевернуто вверх ногами) навозными вилами 単. Две наклонные нижние линии — руки.

Варианты

弃

qì
to abandon; to relinquish; to discard; to throw away
отказаться; отказаться; отказаться; выбрасывать

heisig_chinese_memo: The parents of a really loud and annoying baby try to forsake (abandon) it twenty times but it keeps coming back...so they take off their belt, and buckle the baby to a tree!
heisig_constituent: abandon, infant, toddler, top hat, elbow, buckle, tree, wood
Keyword_KANJIDIC: abandon, throw away, discard, resign, reject, sacrifice
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: отказаться, выбросить, выбросьте, уйти в отставку, отклонить жертву
koohiiStory1: Think of a really loud and annoying baby, you want to abandon it but it keeps coming back...so you take of your belt by the buckle, and buckle the baby to a tree!
koohiiStory2: As in sash (#415), I treat the one mountain in the middle to mean Mt. Fuji (Japan´s ichiban mountain). Now we see an infant being abandoned on top of Mt. Fuji well above the tree line to die of exposure.
jp_example_words:
棄権(きけん): abstain from voting, renunciation of a right
廃棄(はいき): annullment, disposal, abandon, scrap, discarding, repeal
破棄(はき): revocation, annulment, breaking (e.g. treaty)
放棄(ほうき): abandonment, renunciation, abdication (responsibility right)
棄てる(すてる): throw away, cast aside, abandon, resign
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In the trash is a weird looking fruit. Someone decided to abandon it here.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Most people abandon fruit when it's misshapen. It's probably fine though...
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You reach into the trash, take out the abandoned fruit, and bite into it. OUCH! There's a key (き) inside, and you just bit into it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You abandon the fruit and stare intently at this key. It must be why the fruit was weird looking and abandoned in the trash... but what does it go to?! You dig through the trash and try the key on everything that's been abandoned in there.
Ru_Meaning: abandon, throw away, discard, resign, reject, sacrifice
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 亠 (крышка), 凵 (открытая коробка), 厶 (значок МУ), 木 (дерево)
Ru_trainchinese: qì: (графема) бросать, выбрасывать, отказываться от
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the private lidded (𠫓) thirty (丗) trees (木) are abandoned
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A troubled mother has no choice to forsake her infant and so lays him down with her two hands on the church steps.
origin_of_ch_char_book: In ancient East Asia, women often carried their children on their backs. The baby feels protected and attached to the mother in this way (保, bao, protect). This symbol combines a human (人, ren, human) with a child on the right (子, zi=tzu, child) and two points which indicate a pair of hands holding the child. It shows a human carrying a child on his/her back. Now the word has come to mean to “protect”. On the other hand, (棄, 弃, qi=ch’i, abandon) shows a different scene. A child (子, zi=tzu, child), just born with blood on the skin, is on top of a straw basket (其, qi=ch’i, that) and two hands are holding them from below. What is going on? Many people had to abandon their babies due to illness or famine when food was scarce. This character describes such a sad situation. Someone is throwing his/her baby in the basket.
humanum_full_description_en:
Sometimes there are several points next to the baby, one is like amniotic fluid, or it is like sweeping garbage or dust. In ancient times, there were many cases of abandoning infertility due to superstition or difficulties in life. According to legend, the first ancestor of the Zhou Dynasty, Huji, was abandoned after birth and was named " Abandoned " (Qiu Xigui). "Said Wen": "Abandon, donate. From 廾 push 𠦒 to discard it, from 𠫓. 𠫓, Ni Zi also. Abandon, ancient literary abandon. Abandon, 籒 wen abandon." The inscription slightly changed from "廾" (with both hands) ) From the "qi" to the inverted " zi ", the meaning is the same. "Kangxi" " abandoned " even recorded under the classical " 𨓋 " word, that is, from " European allies " from the back " child " from " Chuo " Which, from " Chuo " may refer to the distance to abandon the baby , Its awe-inspiring place is almost in line with the Greek myth Oedipus.

The meaning of the incomplete oracle bone inscriptions is unknown. Jin Wen said to abandon, Zhongshan Wangding: "I will become a king in the past, and abandon the officials early." It means that my father, Cheng Wang, passed away and abandoned the officials very early.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period expressed abandonment, "Guodian Jane. "Lao Zi Jia" Jane 1: "Absolute wisdom (knowledge) abandoned Bian (argument), the people benefited a hundred times (times). Unexpectedly abandoned profits, thief (thief) died (no) and (has). Absolutely abandon false worry, people Recover (recover) the son of the season." It means that if you sever resourcefulness and abandon clever arguments, the people will get a hundredfold benefit. There will be no thieves if you cut off the ingenuity and abandon the desire for profit. Stop deliberate pretentiousness and abandon thoughtful thinking, and the people will return to their infantile mental state (Liu Zhao). "Shangbo Bamboo Book Six. "The King of Zhuang has become the Spirit King of the Minister of Shen" 7: "The king said: "If you don't have a grain to laugh at Chen Gong, your clan (yes) will abandon it. If you don't have a (today) day, if you don't have a clan, you must have your clan's (yes) heart." It means that King Zhuang said to Gong Chen: I used to make fun of Gong Chen. These are words of abandonment. Today, Gong Chen is doing things for me. "Tsinghua Jane II. "Lian Nian" Jane 3-4: "The King Xuan is the First Abandoned Emperor 𢼎 (ji) Futian (Tian)", which means that King Xuan gave up his land and did not pay attention to farming. "Jitian" refers to the land cultivated by the emperor and princes in ancient times. "Mandarin. Zhou Yushang": "Xuan Wang ascended to the throne, not a member of a thousand mu." Wei Zhao's note: "Since the Li Wang and his ilk, Ji Tian was abolished, the Xuan Wang ascended the throne, no longer the ancients."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle fell from " child " from " its " from " European allies ", like hands holding dustpan and throw away the baby, the original meaning is abandoned babies, the idea was abandoned.
humanum_full_description:
有時嬰孩旁有數點，一說象羊水，或認為象掃除的垃圾、塵土。古人生孩子後因迷信或生活困難等原因棄而不育的情況比較多，傳說中，周代的始祖后稷，出生後曾被遺棄，因而名叫「棄」(裘錫圭)。《說文》：「棄，捐也。从廾推𠦒棄之，从𠫓。𠫓，逆子也。弃，古文棄。棄，籒文棄。」金文稍變為從「廾」(雙手)從「其」之訛形從倒「子」，意義相同。《康熙字典》「棄」之下甚至記錄有古文的「𨓋」字，即從「廾」從倒「子」從「辵」，此中，從「辵」可能指把嬰孩往遠處抛棄之，其懾人處，幾可與希臘神話 Oedipus 相表裡。

　　甲骨文辭殘，意義不詳。金文表示抛棄，中山王鼎：「昔者吾先考成王，早棄群臣」，意指先父成王逝世，很早就抛棄群臣。

　　戰國竹簡表示抛棄，《郭店簡．老子甲》簡1：「絕智(知)棄卞(辯)，民利百伓(倍)。絕巧棄利，盜惻(賊)亡(無)又(有)。絕偽棄慮，民复(復)季子。」意謂斷絕智謀、抛棄巧辯，民眾就會獲得百倍的利益。斷絕機巧，抛棄利欲，就不會有盜賊。斷絕故意的做作，抛棄有謀劃的思慮，民眾就會復歸嬰兒似的精神狀態(劉釗)。《上博竹書六．莊王既成 申公臣靈王》簡7：「王曰：『不穀以笑陳公，氏(是)言棄之。含(今)日陳公事不穀，必以氏(是)心。」大意是說莊王對陳公說：我曾取笑陳公，這些是抛棄之言，今日陳公為我辦事，必有嫌棄之心。《清華簡二．繫年》簡3-4：「宣王是始棄帝𢼎(籍)弗畋(田)」，意謂宣王放棄籍田而不重視耕作。「籍田」指古代天子、諸侯徵用民力耕種的田。《國語．周語上》：「宣王即位，不籍千畝。」韋昭注：「自厲王之流，籍田禮廢，宣王即位，不復遵古也。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從倒「子」從「其」從「廾」，象雙手持簸箕把嬰孩扔掉，本義是抛棄嬰兒，引申為抛棄。

棄権(きけん): abstain from voting, renunciation of a right
廃棄(はいき): annullment, disposal, abandon, scrap, discarding, repeal
破棄(はき): revocation, annulment, breaking (e.g. treaty)
放棄(ほうき): abandonment, renunciation, abdication (responsibility right)
棄てる(すてる): throw away, cast aside, abandon, resign

有時嬰孩旁有數點，一說象羊水，或認為象掃除的垃圾、塵土。古人生孩子後因迷信或生活困難等原因棄而不育的情況比較多，傳說中，周代的始祖后稷，出生後曾被遺棄，因而名叫「 棄 」(裘錫圭)。《說文》：「棄，捐也。从廾推𠦒棄之，从𠫓。𠫓，逆子也。弃，古文棄。棄，籒文棄。」金文稍變為從「 廾 」(雙手)從「 其 」之訛形從倒「 子 」，意義相同。《康熙字典》「 棄 」之下甚至記錄有古文的「 𨓋 」字，即從「 廾 」從倒「 子 」從「 辵 」，此中，從「 辵 」可能指把嬰孩往遠處抛棄之，其懾人處，幾可與希臘神話 Oedipus 相表裡。 甲骨文辭殘，意義不詳。金文表示抛棄，中山王鼎：「昔者吾先考成王，早棄群臣」，意指先父成王逝世，很早就抛棄群臣。 戰國竹簡表示抛棄，《郭店簡．老子甲》簡1：「絕智(知)棄卞(辯)，民利百伓(倍)。絕巧棄利，盜惻(賊)亡(無)又(有)。絕偽棄慮，民复(復)季子。」意謂斷絕智謀、抛棄巧辯，民眾就會獲得百倍的利益。斷絕機巧，抛棄利欲，就不會有盜賊。斷絕故意的做作，抛棄有謀劃的思慮，民眾就會復歸嬰兒似的精神狀態(劉釗)。《上博竹書六．莊王既成 申公臣靈王》簡7：「王曰：『不穀以笑陳公，氏(是)言棄之。含(今)日陳公事不穀，必以氏(是)心。」大意是說莊王對陳公說：我曾取笑陳公，這些是抛棄之言，今日陳公為我辦事，必有嫌棄之心。《清華簡二．繫年》簡3-4：「宣王是始棄帝𢼎(籍)弗畋(田)」，意謂宣王放棄籍田而不重視耕作。「籍田」指古代天子、諸侯徵用民力耕種的田。《國語．周語上》：「宣王即位，不籍千畝。」韋昭注：「自厲王之流，籍田禮廢，宣王即位，不復遵古也。」

вм. 弃
Radicals: 果  (fruit, trash)
Meaning Mnemonic
In the trash is a weird looking fruit. Someone decided to abandon it here.
Most people abandon fruit when it's misshapen. It's probably fine though...
Reading Mnemonic
You reach into the trash, take out the abandoned fruit, and bite into it. OUCH! There's a key (き) inside, and you just bit into it.
You abandon the fruit and stare intently at this key. It must be why the fruit was weird looking and abandoned in the trash... but what does it go to?! You dig through the trash and try the key on everything that's been abandoned in there.
